data: [{"id":210,"name":"Dead Metaphor","tagline":"Scottish Breakfast Stout.","first_brewed":"09/2013","description":"Scottish chocolate breakfast Stout - brewed with Brazilian Sertão coffee, Venezuelan cacao and (for the Scottish element) oatmeal. Smooth, chocolately and rich, with a honeycomb mouthfeel and a rich red berry coffee character. Brewed with our beer blogger friends from The Beer Cast and Hopzine.","image_url":"https://images.punkapi.com/v2/210.png","abv":6.8,"ibu":30,"target_fg":1016,"target_og":1068,"ebc":86,"srm":43,"ph":4.4,"attenuation_level":76.5,"volume":{"value":20,"unit":"litres"},"boil_volume":{"value":25,"unit":"litres"},"method":{"mash_temp":[{"temp":{"value":64,"unit":"celsius"},"duration":75}],"fermentation":{"temp":{"value":19,"unit":"celsius"}},"twist":"Cacao: 37.5g at end, Lactose: 125g at end, Ground Coffee: 6.3g at end."},"ingredients":{"malt":[{"name":"Extra Pale","amount":{"value":4.38,"unit":"kilograms"}},{"name":"Wheat","amount":{"value":0.31,"unit":"kilograms"}},{"name":"Dark Crystal","amount":{"value":0.19,"unit":"kilograms"}},{"name":"Brown","amount":{"value":0.31,"unit":"kilograms"}},{"name":"Black Malt","amount":{"value":0.31,"unit":"kilograms"}},{"name":"Carafa Special Malt Type 1","amount":{"value":0.19,"unit":"kilograms"}},{"name":"Flaked Oats","amount":{"value":0.44,"unit":"kilograms"}},{"name":"Crystal 150","amount":{"value":0.31,"unit":"kilograms"}}],"hops":[{"name":"Magnum","amount":{"value":25,"unit":"grams"},"add":"start","attribute":"bitter"}],"yeast":"Wyeast 1056 - American Ale™"},"food_pairing":["Brisket burnt ends","Candied bacon French toast","Coco Pops (add stout to cereal)"],"brewers_tips":"Steep the cocoa nibs and chocolate in the hot wort for a short period for the best extraction of flavour compounds.","contributed_by":"Ali Skinner <AliSkinner>"}]
